title: Photonear
description: Photonear was realized during my second year of my Master's degree.
It is a render engine that uses the Photon Mapping technology (see Henrik Wann Jensen Researchs).
My renderer includes a full User Interface and a scene visualization editor to get the best renders.
With photon mapping, we can render scenes in global illumination with caustics (which is often a problem in realistic rendering).
